db:abstract.db:para: Demonstrates the use of Calendar control.

db:article.db:programlisting:
QT += qml quick sql TARGET = calendar
include(src/src.pri) include(../shared/shared.pri)
OTHER_FILES += qml/main.qml
RESOURCES += resources.qrc
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quickcontrols/controls/calendar INSTALLS += target
